title: District Profile: Fight For Southern Arizona Seat Is 2012 Rematch
teaser: Incumbent Democrat Ron Barber faces a 2012 rematch with Republican Martha McSally.
contentencoded:
In this week’s installment of our District Profile series, we turn to Arizona’s Second Congressional district, where incumbent Democrat Ron Barber — the successor to Gabby Giffords — faces a 2012 rematch with Republican Martha McSally.

Arizona Public Media‘s Ted Robbins joins Here & Now’s Peter O’Dowd to talk more about the race.

  • Hear more District Profiles

Guest

  • Ted Robbins, reporter for Arizona Public Media in Tucson. He tweets @trobbinsnpr.
